alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued September 24 at 2:45PM MDT until September 25 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 8 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. * WHERE...Central and southern portions of the San Luis Valley Below 8500 Feet. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 8 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation, and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley
